messages.message:
it was built consistently fine in the release sandbox
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1732804611952129

trigger the certification again?
I just tried a fresh uncached build of the image on a crafting sandbox and it built in 20mins.
@jayapandian.ponraj  can you help recertify tomorrow (Friday) IST

:man-shrugging: 
Ran it ok crafting last night and it took 70+ minutes before I quit for the night. 

Seems inconsistent at best. We’ve seen it creep up to sizes that intermittently fail before, and then keep growing to the point of being unbuildable.

It does only seem to be an issue on 24.07 builds for whatever that’s worth. The other branches all built fine
More than 1 hour in. Model-service is still building - https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/job/certify-service-v2/63338/console

I must not be reading this right but why does it look like the service is being built twice?
```20:55:22  #42 exporting to image
20:55:22  #42 exporting layers
21:23:15  #42 exporting layers 1673.7s done
21:23:15  #42 exporting manifest sha256:28d724212ff9f26a364c3e313915c2bc1461f58a68805b27d5d1f16682063bf1 0.0s done
21:23:15  #42 exporting config sha256:88525a27d923f6a016997d89a328e23a3d65a9b23bd9010712fc1f8130eb694a 0.0s done
21:23:15  #42 pushing layers
21:23:16  #42 ...
21:23:16  
21:23:16  #43 [auth] sharing credentials for 083423824311.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
21:23:16  #43 DONE 0.0s
21:23:16  
21:23:16  #42 exporting to image
21:34:26  #42 pushing layers 670.6s done
21:34:26  #42 pushing manifest for 083423824311.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/instabase-public/model-service:24.07.36-e1fc0fc8e0@sha256:28d724212ff9f26a364c3e313915c2bc1461f58a68805b27d5d1f16682063bf1
21:34:26  #42 pushing manifest for 083423824311.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/instabase-public/model-service:24.07.36-e1fc0fc8e0@sha256:28d724212ff9f26a364c3e313915c2bc1461f58a68805b27d5d1f16682063bf1 0.5s done
21:34:26  #42 DONE 2344.9s    <-------------- this should be it, shouldn't it?
21:34:26  
21:34:26   [33m4 warnings found (use --debug to expand):
...
...
...
21:50:30  #40 exporting to image
21:50:30  #40 exporting layers```

I guess it’s cause we’re pushing to ecr first and then gcr?
If so, then the build is not taking 2hrs. Building it twice is apparently taking 2+hrs.

I see only one recent change in model-service. https://github.com/instabase/instabase/commits/release-24.07.0-enterprise/data-services/model-services/model-service/Makefile

Are u testing with that change pulled in ?
If yes, shoudl we revert the recent change and try ?

release sandbox just built fine? https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CCY413CSU/p1732862119437869

what is the difference here in certify build that is resulting in continued failures? It seems the build triggered earlier has failed
https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/job/certify-service-v2/63338/console
